LanguageData.Hediffs_PuffedRice.label: POP-POP!!!
LanguageData.Hediffs_PuffedRice.description: I ate a delicious snack of Muri!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Amazake.label: Sweet, sweet, Amazake~!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Amazake.description: So, I might of had a wee bit to drink...
LanguageData.Hediffs_Umeshu.label: Refreshing drink
LanguageData.Hediffs_Umeshu.description: I may-or may not-have drank some plum wine.
LanguageData.Hediffs_DrinkingWater.label: Hydration
LanguageData.Hediffs_DrinkingWater.description: Drinking water will/can/may/won't prevent heat stroke.
